title: Minute Calculation from Time of Day
description: This function calculates the minute component from a given Time of Day (TOD) input. The function takes a Time of Day input, processes it, and returns the integer minute value derived from the input time.
name: MINUTE

input.name: itod
input.description: The Time of Day input from which the minute value will be calculated.

return_value.description: The calculated minute value derived from the given Time of Day input.
